model

Class Business

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Business
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Business
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Business class will contain the necessary variables and methods to calculate the profits, costs, and revenues. This class behaves as the model for the profit screen, and the inventory class acts like the controller as it changes the state of the Business class. This class is also serializable.
    Author:
    Joey
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
